Title: Relates to prohibiting the sale of salvia divinorum to persons in New York state
Summary: Prohibits the sale of salvia divinorum in New York state; defines salvia divinorum; sets penalties for sale and provides a defense.
LawCode: Add ยง391-u, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the sale of salvia divinorum to persons in New York state
